description: Find and enrich B2B contacts and companies for prospecting and outreach. Uncover verified emails, phone numbers, and firmographic insights. Review your organization's saved leads and track research progress and credit usage.

capabilities.name: search_contacts
capabilities.description: Search for contacts with advanced filtering options including company, location, job title, seniority, and job changes

capabilities.name: search_companies
capabilities.description: Search for companies with filters including name, location, size, revenue, technologies, and founding date

capabilities.name: research_contacts
capabilities.description: Research/enrich contact information. Can use search result IDs or provide partial contact info for enrichment

capabilities.name: research_companies
capabilities.description: Research/enrich company information. Can use search result IDs or provide partial company info

capabilities.name: poll_contact_research
capabilities.description: Poll the status and results of contact research requests

capabilities.name: poll_company_research
capabilities.description: Poll the status and results of company research requests

capabilities.name: get_org_contacts
capabilities.description: Get contacts from your organization within a date range

capabilities.name: get_org_companies
capabilities.description: Get companies from your organization within a date range

capabilities.name: get_rate_limit_info
capabilities.description: Get current rate limit and credit information
